data.title: Bangkok expressways free on Tuesday to cut costs, holiday traffic
data.description: Toll fees on three expressways waived for Constitution Day amid expected travel surge

data.title: Increase in unemployment likely in early 2025, expert says
data.description: Advisory Council for National Workforce Development chairman says stagnant economy is still forcing businesses to reduce their workforce

data.title: Bankers review PM’s performance in first 100 days
data.description: While generally giving Paetongtarn a positive review, the two bankers make recommendations for further reviving the economy

data.title: Chinese visitors to Thailand between January-November top 6 million
data.description: Total foreign tourist arrivals exceed 32 million in first 11 months of 2024 with revenue reaching 1.5 trillion baht

data.title: The season of giving
data.description: From traditional treats to a local twist, Guru By Bangkok Post rounds up the best holiday hampers to make someone’s day.

data.title: Myanmar Embassy in Thailand denies 1,800-baht slip fee for 2-year work permit
data.description: The Myanmar Embassy in Thailand announced that it is not true that a slip fee of 1,800 baht must be paid to the embassy to apply for a two-year temporary work permit.

data.title: Ed Sheeran's Himalayan Adventure: First international star to perform in Bhutan
data.description: Music sensation Ed Sheeran is set to make history with an extraordinary performance in the Land of Thunder Dragon. The Grammy-winning artist has chosen the mystical kingdom of Bhutan as the opening destination for his 2025 Mathematics Tour in Asia and the Middle East.

data.title: Kritchanya triumphs in playoff to secure double titles at 4th JAT-NB3 Elite Series
data.description: The highly determined Kritchanya Kaopattanasakul produced a crucial birdie to edge out Pimpakorn Panyadilok in a nerve-wracking playoff, clinching victories in both the Girls’ A-Class and the Open category as the fourth JAT-NB3 Elite Series concluded at Lotus Valley Golf Resort on Sunday.

data.title: Turning trash to cash
data.description: Allianz is a global company committed to operating a business that supports sustainability. From the 17 Sustainable Development Goals created by the UN, Allianz emphasises three -- climate action, decent work and economic growth, and partnerships.

data.title: Xmas market comes to Emsphere
data.description: The Em Market Hall on the ground floor of Emsphere has been transformed into a European Christmas market for "Gourmet Winter Wondersquare 2024", which is running daily from 10am to 10pm, until Jan 5.

data.title: Atta Gallery presents intersecting worlds
data.description: Our environment and the events surrounding us have served as a wellspring of inspiration for two veteran female artists from two countries during "Intersection: Where Two Paths Meet", which is running at Atta Gallery until Jan 12.

data.title: Local Christmas trees spread joy, pride at Central malls
data.description: The distinct identities of each region of Thailand are reflected through 11 handcrafted Christmas trees currently on display at 11 Central shopping centres nationwide, until Jan 5.

data.title: Immortality reimagined
data.description: Why would a vampire want to give up immortality?

data.title: Syrians celebrate with jubilation, gunfire as Assad family's rule ends
data.description: Syrians poured into streets echoing with celebratory gunfire on Sunday after a stunning rebel advance reached the capital, putting an end to the Assad family’s 50 years of iron rule but raising questions about the future of the country and the wider region.

data.title: Warnings issued as woman dies after neck-twisting massage
data.description: The case of a female singer who died after receiving a massage at a parlour in Udon Thani province went viral among netizens on Sunday.

data.title: Wa State claims rumours of confrontations with Thai soldiers false
data.description: Stresses that it has never declared Thailand an enemy or intended to go to war with Thai military

data.title: Police break up party in Bangkok hotel room, seize drugs
data.description: More than 100 Thai and foreign tourists allegedly partying with booze, drugs

data.title: Pichai discusses economic cooperation, FTA with UK ambassador
data.description: Discussions emphasised mutual commitment to expanding trade and investment

data.title: Cool seasonal weather attracts tourists to Mae Hong Son
data.description: Tourists have been flocking to the Pang Ung reservoir and Ban Rak Thai village in Mae Hong Son province to experience cool weather at temperatures around 12-14 degrees Celsius.

data.title: Poor-quality steel bars worth over THB200m seized from Thai factory
data.description: The Industry Ministry cracked down on a Thai steel bar factory in Si Racha district of  Chonburi province, confiscating poor-quality steel bars worth over 200 million baht.
